post.body: Grab ur banjo, Its an Xmas hoedown, only no dancing. This is moms idea of fun. Santa better send me a bonus gift 4 this one...
Snow on the beach. A good day to stay in w/a warm beverage. Chillin @ the WaterWitch...
done with work, I think my hands are going to fall off.....
Santa is still hungovr. Going back to bed...
On my way home, catching the last boat. Soaked to the bone.
A riveting piece of theatre. Not that it made much sense, but riveting nonetheless...
In the city. Warming w sum hot cocoa. The eve begins
Riding the ferry into NYC. Gonna take a schvitz & go out 4 Thai food!
WooHoo! Im in Ithaca
Watching Alf reruns. Just the mind jelly the Dr ordered
SaltNpePa never gets old, does it...
Apparently im going to be a massage therapist this year for Halloween...one more to go!
Could the day be any slower? Not enuf bodies...
Alleviating world stress, one person @ a time. One done, 2 more people to go for today...
MARCO!...
A day @ the turkish baths, a nite @ the bar - go Ohio State!
Setting off smoke alarms - breakfast is served. Mmmm, pancakes!
Belly full of sushi. Smoking a cigar. Waiting 4 the comedy to begin.
One deluxe vacation massage complete. One pre-natal left to go.
Made the boat w 15secs to spare. Going to the city to drink some wine!
